Anyway, I ended up having her and her siblings, her mom, and some of her friends over to learn all about Elijah the ferret! It was so fun! I love teaching people about this awesome animal! entry.title: Ferret, wild animal rescue thrives in Brandy Station - Inside NoVA
entry.summary: Little did Karen Lamb know stepping into a pet store in Virginia over 25 years ago would change the direction of her life forever.Â â€œI made the cardinal mistake of seeing a cute little furry animal in a pet store and I bought it,â€ she recalled. â€œI didnâ€™t know anything about them.â€Lamb founded and has operated The Nirvana Ridge Ferret Rescue since 1997. She opened the rescue soon after she got her first pet ferret after moving to Virginia from California where owning ferrets as pets is illegal. Over 2,000 ferrets have passed through Lambâ€™s Nirvana Ridge Ferret Rescue in Brandy Station. Margarita Orange Since then, over 2,000 ferrets have come through her door.California is one of two states that restricts ferret ownership - the other is Hawaii. The only way Californians can legaâ€¦

entry.title:
What Do Ferrets Eat?
The short answer: meat, bones, and organs.
The easiest way to venture a guess as to what a ferret should ...
entry.summary: What Do Ferrets Eat? The short answer: meat, bones, and organs. The easiest way to venture a guess as to what a ferret should eat is to look at their teeth. Does this ferretâ€™s mouth (above) remind you of any other animalsâ€™ mouths you may know? To me it looks an awful lot like a small dog or cat, NOT a rat or a mouse. These ferret's teeth are sharp in order to tear through the meat and bone of their prey! How cool! #ferret #ferrets #ferretsofinstagram(Feed generated with FetchRSS)

entry.title: Photos from The Modern Ferret's post
entry.summary: I had the absolute pleasure of presenting about ferrets to children in an organization called Royal Family Kids (which serves neglected and abused children in the foster care system). It was so fun to teach the kids something and make them laugh. This program has absolutely changed my life and touched my heart in ways I never wouldâ€™ve expected. â€œHe comforts us in all our troubles so that we can comfort others. When they are troubled, we will be able to give them the same comfort God has given us.â€ 1 Corinthians 1:4 #ferret #ferrets #ferretsofinstagram(Feed generated with FetchRSS)
